name: Bart-Mangled Banner
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), John Frink, Daniel Chun (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: An accidental photo showing Bart mooning the American flag makes the Simpsons the most hated family in town.
